title: 服务器开启不了，一直崩溃无法启动
author: CXi_Chen
txt_content:
RT，看报错。

26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 # hs_err_pid18451.log26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 # An error report file with more information is saved as:26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 # Native memory allocation (mmap) failed to map 2863136768 bytes for committing reserved memory.26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 #26.11 10:40:02 [服务器] 信息 OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x0000000715580000, 2863136768, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)26.11 10:40:01 [服务器] 信息 OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=128M; support was removed in 8.0

replies.author: Luckily_Baby
replies.txt_content: 把服务端的启动器重新编辑最大最小内存，设置大一点。。

replies.author: Minecraft_cloud
replies.txt_content: 不够内存的问题~~~尝试调整下内存把~~
